## ðŸš€ Getting Started

1. **Fork the repository**  
   Click the **Fork** button at the top right of this page to create your own copy.

2. **Clone your fork locally**
    ```bash
    git clone https://github.com/Sagar-Shetty21/My-Notes.git
    cd MyNotes
    ```
